#summary Outline of the key concepts in Xtrabackup Manager

= Introduction =

This page outlines the key concepts in Xtrabackup Manager. Perhaps more use to developers and early users at this point.


= Concepts =

To understand how Xtrabackup Manager works, you should first understand the basic concepts that exist within the tool.


== Backup Volumes ==

  * Description: A backup volume is a way to tell Xtrabackup Manager which path to store backups in. It can be any type of device you like, so long as the user that your backup runs as has full permissions.
  * Table: backup_volumes
  * Example: `INSERT INTO backup_volumes (name, path) VALUES ('My Storage Array', '/data');`
